text: Arlene Golonka (January 23, 1936 - May 31, 2021) was an American actress who worked mostly on television. She was known for playing bubbly and eccentric blondes. She played Millie Swanson in The Andy Griffith Show. She also did Hang 'Em High, The Rockford Files, Murder, She Wrote and All in the Family. Golonka was born in Chicago. She died on May 31, 2021 in Palm Desert, California at the age of 85. title: Arlene Golonka
